target.name: usage
target.echo:
TARGETS
DEPLOYMENT: all/deploy/install: Deploys entire target pre-deploy (test if not production) advance-build restart revert: revert-build restart pre-deploy: Deploys entire WEB-INF environment to the pre-build directories advance-build: Moves the prebuild directory to current revert-build: Moves the post-build directory to current, but does not restart gwt: Compile gwt targets to the pre-directory jsp-compile: Precompile jsp files and generate appropriate web.xml servlert reference
PROPERTIES: createEnum: Rebuild java class ZfinPropertiesEnum. createPropertiesFiles: Creates TT file (createTTFile) and env file (createEnvFile) for given INSTANCE. exportAllInstances: Exports all instances defined by instances.properties.
DEVELOPMENT: dirtydeploy: Deploys entire WEB-INF environment changes without cleaning dirty-gwt: Deploys all gwt instances into the active target directory do: Clean, compile and build entire WEB-INF environment. No copying into target directory clean: Cleans WEB-INF target compile: Compile WEB-INF target only runHibernate: Run the HibernateStandaloneUtil class to check your Persistence
UTILITIES: deploy-javadoc: Create the JavaDoc and deploy it into the targetroot build-properties: Echos important build-propertiets. echoProps: Print out all java properties jversion: Print out the used JVM javadocs: Create JavaDoc for ZFIN API generate-wsdl-doi-client: Generates wsdl java client code for the DOI graph: Generates dotty graph.
TOMCAT: tomcat-restart: Restarts tomcat tomcat-start: Start tomcat tomcat-debug-start: Start tomcat and allow remote debugging on port $JPDA_ADDRESS tomcat-stop: Stop tomcat tomcat-kill: Forced tomcat stop deploy-catalina-base: Build/update tomcat instance in CATALINA_BASE (used to be called create-mutant-instance)
TESTS: test: Always run this before comitting. Seriously. (currently just points to runtests-quiet) unittests: Runs non-db test suites in org.zfin.UnitTests runDBtests: Runs db test suites in org.zfin.DbUnitTests runBlasttests: Runs db and blast test suites combined in org.zfin.sequence.blast.BlastAndDBTests blastStressTest: Runs a blast stress test. enumtests: Tests only enumerations against the database smokeTests: Tests via http requests against our site. serviceTests: Tests third-party service connections. runtests-quiet: Runs all test suites in org.zfin.UnitTests but only gives a summary compile-tests: Compiles test directories runTagTests: Compiles and deploys all tag-unit-testing code into a separate application root directory. Deploys it into an app server root directory specified by the environment variable TAGUNIT_HOME blastHeuristics: Runs full blast heuristics to determine the optimal blast setting. runBlasttests: Runs all blast tests; have to have ssh keys to genomix set up in order to run these from ant deploy.
